column5: I'd love to take my parents and kids to ice fishing. Don't know if it's safe on Scugog? Any inputs will be appreciated.
Theres safe ice out there, 5-6inches in front of my house but there's still thins spots (2") all over the place so make sure you check the ice as you go.
Should have checked this before I posted - thanks!
Thanks for the info. Don't want to risk with kids. I might come back and check updates next week.
